attributes.comment:
I strenuously object to the proposed increase in immigration fees, and, in particular, those
necessary for the adoption of an international child. A reasonable fee increase to reflect increases
in actual processing costs and the effects of inflation is acceptable. The increases proposed are
not acceptable.
It is extremely expensive to adopt a child, domestic or international. These additional fees make it
even more difficult for an average family to open its home to an orphan. These proposed increases
are nothing more than an attempt to raise government revenue without the political risk of raising
individual and corporate taxes.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anne Gilbert
